lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Howard Berman, D-Calif., would like to see the definition extended to include sugar cane, cultivation of which is "a breeding ground for one of the scandals of the nation," Gene Smith, a spokesman for Berman, said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: USDA officials declined to comment on the draft regulation except to say it was subject to change before it will be released, probably some time later this month.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Chuck Fields of the American Farm Bureau Federation said livestock producers were "desperate" because they fear they will be unable to retain the many illegal aliens who have joined that industry.
